name: Community-map
tagline: Building a large map for Rigs of Rods.
body:
### Welcome to the Rigs of Rods Community Map Project.


### What people are working on:

* DarthCain- Roads, buildings etc 

### Planned features that need work:

* Everything

### Community modeling opportunities:

* Exit signs, and gas/food/lodging signs before the exits 
* Highway rest stop 
* Car service center 
* Truck stop 
* Residential areas, with both houses and apartments 
* Hospital 
* Hotel/motel 
* Small airport 
* Post office 
* Rural farming area outside the town 
* Warehouses 
* Strip malls 
* Elementary/high school 
* Storage units 
* Construction sites 
* Restaurants 
* Parts Stores 
* Car dealerships 
* Truck Dealerships 
* Tractor Dealerships 
* Factories 
* Liquor Stores 
* Drug Stores 
* Grocery Stores 
* Town Hall(s)
* Jail(s) 
* Police Station(s) 
* Court house(s) 
* Main street buildings 

### Authors and Contributors
* DarthCain - Project Manager
* MrSteakPotato - Textures
* derbymutt-shaders - Various buildings 
* DODGE charger - Truck Dealership 
* hotrod55 - 0.4 Conversion 
* LJFHutch- Trees 
* Donoteat - Buildings, city road layout

####Map is only for .4+
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
